titles.title: We are Gathered In This Place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
We are gathered in this place,
assembled in His Name
to worship Him (2x)
We are gathered in this place,
assembled in His Name
to worship Christ the Lord,
Worship Him, Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Just forget about yourself
and concentrate on Him
and worship Him ( 2x)
Just forget about yourself
and concentrate on Him
and worship Christ the Lord,
Worship Him, Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He is all my righteousness,
I stand complete in Him
and worship Him (2x)
He is all my righteousness,
I stand complete in Him
and worship Christ the Lord,
Worship Him, Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let us lift up holy hands
and magnify His Name
and worship Him (2x)
Let us lift up holy hands
and magnify His Name
and worship Christ the Lord,
Worship Him, Christ the Lord.
